summary: Its a rapier. No tricks here. Maybe a few.
descriptionHtml:
It does damage. Fun with the elemental fury. Unfortunately I could not figure out how to get around shields. People who block will wreck you if you hit them while they are blocking and you don\\\'t have defense. I have learned a few more things about creation kit and i will tweak some things hopefully. Also it might be craft-able under glass. 

Oh and let me know if it doesnt work. Steam is easy mode for uploads in comparison.
author: Zeal0tWarrior
